vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Νικόδημος, -ου, ὁ
Nicodemus: Jhn.3:1, 4 3:9 7:50 19:39.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Jhn.3.1
§ Nicodemus, "victor over people"
Nicodemus, (Proper name), Jn. 3:1, 4, 9; 7:50; 19:39*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
尼哥底母 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "征服者"
猶太公會的一員, 追隨了耶穌
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
尼哥底母 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "征服者"
犹太公会的一员, 追随了耶稣
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Ni-cô-đem « thắng hơn dân sự » Xem G3534 và G1218.
